original_text: So I went in and saw. And there, engraved on the wall all around, was every form of creeping things and loathsome beasts, and all the idols of the house of Israel.
korean_text: 내가 들어가 보니 각양 곤충과 가증한 짐승과 이스라엘 족속의 모든 우상을 그 사방 벽에 그렸고

sentences.original_text: So I went in and saw.
And there, engraved on the wall all around,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳 사방 벽에 새겨진 것은,

sentences.original_text: every form of creeping things and loathsome beasts,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 종류의 기어 다니는 것과 가증한 짐승들이었고,

sentences.original_text: and all the idols of the house of Israel.
